circumstances: The single engine airplane departed Triengen Aerodrome for a local skydiving flight, carrying eight skydivers and one pilot. At an altitude of 3,000 meters, after seven skydivers jumped out, the left ailerons detached. The pilot and the remaining passenger abandoned the aircraft that entered a dive and crashed onto a house located in the village of Triengen. The aircraft and the house were destroyed while there were no injuries and no casualties.
probable_cause: In-flight detachment of the left ailerons caused by the failure of the aileron control cable that had previously been damaged for reasons that investigations were unable to determine.
